---
Test
---
!4 1. Add the Version Checker
|script|browser test                                       |
|Go to the Suite For Integration Tests                     |
|ensure|is not visible on page    |Maven Version Checker   |
|click |xpath=(//a[@href= 'SuiteForIntegrationTests?edit'])|
|press |PAGE_DOWN                                          |
|# Write a enter and the symbol                            |
|press enter                                               |
|press enter                                               |
|press |!Version                                           |
|press |Checker                                            |
|# Save and check if visable                               |
|click |xpath=(//input[@type= 'submit'])                   |
|ensure|is visible on page        |Maven Version Checker   |

!4 2. Remove the Version Checker
|script|browser test                                       |
|Go to the Suite For Integration Tests                     |
|ensure|is visible on page        |Maven Version Checker   |
|click |xpath=(//a[@href= 'SuiteForIntegrationTests?edit'])|
|press |PAGE_DOWN                                          |
|# Delete the symbol                                       |
|press |CONTROL+SHIFT+ARROW_UP                             |
|press |BACK_SPACE                                         |
|press |BACK_SPACE                                         |
|# Save and check if visable                               |
|click |xpath=(//input[@type= 'submit'])                   |
|ensure|is not visible on page    |Maven Version Checker   |
